title: Element Appearing More Than 25% In Sorted Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an integer array sorted in non-decreasing order, there is exactly one integer in the array that occurs more than 25% of the time.
Return that integer.
 
Example 1:
Input: arr = [1,2,2,6,6,6,6,7,10]

title: Find Numbers with Even Number of Digits - Array - Easy - LeetCode
Replace Elements with Greatest Element on Right Side - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an array arr, replace every element in that array with the greatest element among the elements to its right, and replace the last element with -1.
After doing so, return the array.
 
Example 1:
Input: arr = [17,18,5,4,6,1]
Output: [18,6,6,6,1,-1]
